title: An algorithmic theory of learning: Robust concepts and random projection
venue: 40th Annual Symposium on Foundations of Computer Science (Cat. No.99CB37039)

tldr.text: This work provides a novel algorithmic analysis via a model of robust concept learning (closely related to “margin classifiers”), and shows that a relatively small number of examples are sufficient to learn rich concept classes.
